channel.title: How to dedicate a server?
channel.description: How do i dedicate a server ? Dedicated server = NEVER LAGG , 24/7 server and if u get alot of players exemple 130 players+ the sver will never lag. some people know how can you help me :D? so somone know Oo?

item.title: How to dedicate a server?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

renting for 29$ a month is much cheaper than keeping your PC on inside your house…

500-700 watts is teh power supply that most computers use these days.

first 500 watts is like 6 cents hourly than longer u run the more it gets to 10 cents etc…, so it can add up alot in a monthly bill…

http://michaelbluejay.com/electricity/cost.html

ofc i read this
An Energy Star computer uses 70% less electricity.
If left inactive, Energy Star computers enter a low-power mode and use 15 watts or less.

most computers are not energy star lol

Read full topic

item.title: How to dedicate a server?
item.dc:creator: @newservermaker newservermaker
item.description:
@newservermaker wrote:

  1. to stop a server from laging you need a couple things:
    -fast comp probably over 2g rams
    -a good internet, i suggest somthing that istn none of that $30 shit and the stuff thats $60+

  2. a server can never be 24/7 without having some really shity client (almost all clients will have somthing in it which sets the server off every sertin amount of times for a auto-compile were you then must re-start server) and you also need to get a anti-crash file… these are very difficult to find and make so you probably wont have any chance in making your server 24/7.

Read full topic

item.title: How to dedicate a server?
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

http://www.dedicatedhosting.com/ lol see they cost around 250$… PER MONTH…

now if you want a cheap dedicated server don’t expect it not to lag with atleast 100+ players… it might its all luck… but it will be up 24\7.
http://www.serverpronto.com/ see these dedicated servers are 29$ per month cheapest it can get.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

the only difference is that the machine is only for your server, and if you think about it, for $500-$5000 is 130 worth that, i dont think so. so wat im gonna do is kinda do what runescape does, but thats a secret untill i release it! but yea, it will eventually lag and definately not free.[/quote]

Actually some dedicated start at like $60. And you fail about the runescape does part.
